enable_custom_text_styling.label: Enable custom styling
enable_custom_text_styling.info: This will overwrite the heading settings above.
enable_custom_text_styling.second_info: This will overwrite the subheading settings above.
enable_custom_text_styling.third_info: This will overwrite the text font size.

title.label: Heading
title.info: Wrap your text between | to use accent color. For example: Heading |continued| text.

subtitle.label: Subheading
subtitle.info: Wrap your text between | to use accent color. For example: Subheading |continued| text.

variant_bulk.label: Variant bulk order
variant_bulk.info: Customers will be able to add product variants. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8825899-xpert-variant-bulk-order)

enable_variant_bulk_order.label: Enable variant bulk order
enable_variant_bulk_order.info: Customers will be able to add product variants. Only applicable when product cards layout ‘list’ is enabled. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8825899-xpert-variant-bulk-order)

look_position.label: Position
look_position.info: This is the position of the add to cart button that will appear in the banner.

fix_zindex.label: Control the stacking order of sections
fix_zindex.info: Increase or decrease the z-index value to control the visual layering of sections, ensuring the desired display arrangement when using negative spacing. [Read more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789783-z-index-settings)

rtl.label: Enable RTL text direction
rtl.info: Arabic, Hebrew and Persian are the most widespread RTL writing systems in modern times. Online stores in RTL language are recommended to enable this setting. [Learn more ](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/7938629-accessibility)

banners_clickable.label: Clickable images
banners_clickable.info: Enable this to make images clickable instead of only a clickable link, for example in a banner.

darkmode_logo.label: Logo image for dark background
darkmode_logo.info: Make sure this logo image has the same dimensions as the regular logo image.

mobile_logo.label: Mobile logo image
mobile_logo.info: Leave empty if you want to use the same logo as uploaded for desktop. The logo is always centered on mobile.

mobile_darkmode_logo.label: Mobile logo image for dark background
mobile_darkmode_logo.info: Make sure this logo image has the same dimensions as the regular mobile logo image.

width.label: Content maximum width
width.info: When you choose 2000px, the content will be full width.

everything_rounded.label: Show all elements with round corners
everything_rounded.info: This will add round corners to all styled elements like boxes and labels.

dropdown_color.label: Menus and drawers
dropdown_color.info: This is the color scheme of your mega menu or dropdown menu. Mobile menu, search drawer, side cart, filters, shop the look drawer, quickshop cart, other drawers and dropdowns will automatically use this color scheme.

active_tabs_color.label: Active tabs
active_tabs_color.info: This is the color scheme of active tabs in content blocks on the productpage and in the section 'content tabs'.

product_label.paragraph: Click [here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789852-products) for information about adding labels.

color_swatch_name.label: Color swatches name
color_swatch_name.info: The option name used for the color swatches, for example 'Color' or 'Colour'. You can add multiple names by entering each on a separate line.

color_swatch_hexes.label: Custom colors
color_swatch_hexes.info: For each color: enter on a separate line the name of the color, then a colon (:) followed by the hex code (for example: Red: #DC143C).

fonts.paragraph: Not all font families support multiple font weights.

custom_fonts.paragraph: Custom fonts can be added in two ways: by uploading a font file or bt using an Adobe font snippet. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8817864-typography-and-custom-fonts)

custom_primary_font_file.label: Custom primary font file
custom_primary_font_file.info: Upload your font file in the 'Files' section of your Shopify admin.

custom_primary_font_snippet.label: Custom primary font snippet
custom_primary_font_snippet.info: The snippet looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/abc123.css">

custom_secondary_font_file.label: Custom secondary font file
custom_secondary_font_file.info: Upload your font file in the 'Files' section of your Shopify admin.

custom_secondary_font_snippet.label: Custom secondary font snippet
custom_secondary_font_snippet.info: The snippet looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/abc123.css">

global_title_size.label: Default heading font size
global_title_size.info: Applicable to static pages like the account login and register pages.

enable_hyphens.label: Enable hyphens
enable_hyphens.info: This will add hyphens to long words to prevent them from breaking the layout.

product_images.paragraph: These settings can also be found separately on the collection page and product page.

custom_product_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_product_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

multiply.paragraph: Apply this effect on your product or collection images, it will hide the white background. Recommended when using a colored general background and images with a white background.

multiply_product_images.label: Pass through colors on product images

options__3.label: Enable pass through with a light background

multiply_collection_images.label: Pass through colors on collection images

options__3.label: Enable pass through with a light background

banners_clickable.label: Clickable images
banners_clickable.info: Enable this to make images clickable instead of only a clickable link, for example in a banner.

button_border.label: Border thickness
button_border.info: Only applicable when 'no fill' is selected.

enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove.label: Enable undo deleted products
enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove.info: Enable this if you want to give a visitor the option if a product is removed, it can be undone.

enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove_delay.label: Enable timer for undo deleted products
enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove_delay.info: This will show the undo feature for a certain amount of seconds.

cart_enable_variants.label: Enable variant bulk order
cart_enable_variants.info: A clear overview is shown of the variants and quantities that the visitor has added to his cart. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8818200-cart)

enable_cart_drawer.label: Enable cart drawer
enable_cart_drawer.info: When adding products to the cart or when clicking the cart icon in the header, this will open a cart side drawer instead of redirecting to the cart page.

enable_cart_drawer_upsell_complementary.label: Show cart complementary products
enable_cart_drawer_upsell_complementary.info: Products can be selected in Shopify's Search & Discovery app.

show_trustbadge.label: Show secure and safe checkout trustbadge
show_trustbadge.info: It will be shown automatically in the cart drawer, cart page and it can also be added as a block on the productpage and on the featured product section.

trustbadge_custom_image.label: Custom image
trustbadge_custom_image.info: Upload your own custom secure image to show next to the secure & safe checkout text. .png or .svg or .svg file recommended.

search_drawer_popular_collections_title.label: Heading
search_drawer_popular_collections_title.info: Promote popular collections and/or important products when search bar is empty.

background_opacity.label: Background opacity
background_opacity.info: Only applicable when ‘Variant picker’ is selected in ‘Layout’.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button label.

name.label: Variant picker name
name.info: The option name used for the size options, for example 'Size' or 'Sizes'. You can add multiple names by entering each on a separate line.

sale_label_price.label: Show saved amount as label next to the price

show_stock_label.label: Show 'Last stock!' on products
show_stock_label.info: When stock is running low on a product, inform your visitors about this. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789852-products)

stock_label_qty.label: Stock level to show ‘Last stock!’ label

product_custom_label.label: Metafield: custom label
product_custom_label.info: Create a metafield for a custom label and enter the namespace and key here (e.g. custom.label) [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789852-products)

show_product_stock_qty.label: Stock level to show available product stock
show_product_stock_qty.info: You can also check 'always show available product stock' below to override this.

product_short_description.label: Show product short description
product_short_description.info: Show a part of the product description or use a custom text.

product_short_description_text.label: Metafield: custom short description
product_short_description_text.info: Create a metafield for a custom short description and enter the namespace and key here (e.g. custom.short_description) [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789852-products)

qty_input_controls.label: Amount selection layout
qty_input_controls.info: 'Input counter' enables customers to increment/decrement the quantity by using +/- buttons.

quickshop_behavior.label: Behaviour
quickshop_behavior.info: Only applicable when ‘Quickshop’ or ‘Add to cart’ is selected.

productcard_form_layout.label: Add to cart form layout
productcard_form_layout.info: Only applicable on Layout ‘Add to cart (with variants)’.

cart_icon_no_text.label: Show ‘Add to cart’ text instead of cart icon
cart_icon_no_text.info: Only applicable on Layout ‘Add to cart (with variants)’. This will show when there are no variants or when form layout 'in rows' is chosen.

plus_icon_no_cart.label: Show ‘plus’ icon instead of cart icon

image_behaviour.label: Product card image behaviour
image_behaviour.info: Slider is only applicable on collection pages.

show_price_varies.label: Show price range on product cards
show_price_varies.info: When different variants of a product have a different price range, this will show on your product card.

enable_product_ratings.label: Show product ratings
enable_product_ratings.info: The ratings will be automatically pulled from your review app.

color_swatch_behavior.label: Color swatches behaviour
color_swatch_behavior.info: ‘On hover’ is only applicable when ‘Basic’ layout is selected.

color_swatches_single.label: Hide color swatches when product has only one color variant

enable_compare.label: Enable product compare
enable_compare.info: Customers will be able to compare products (max 3). [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8817709-product-compare)

compare_checkboxes_productcards.label: Show compare checkboxes on product cards

compare_button_position.label: Button position
compare_button_position.info: When products are added to the comparision, a sticky button appears at the bottom of the page.

compare_enable_options.label: Product options
compare_enable_options.info: Product options such as: color and size.

compare_enable_custom.label: Product metafields
compare_enable_custom.info: Add metafields below to add them to the compare table.

compare_custom_metafields.label: Product metafields
compare_custom_metafields.info: For each metafield: enter on a separate line the name, then a colon (:) followed by the namespace and key combination (for example: Ingredients: custom.ingredients).

enable_free_shipping.label: Enable free shipping
enable_free_shipping.info: Note that this feature does not work well when multi-currency is enabled. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789851-shipping-and-delivery)

free_shipping_amount.label: Minimum order amount to free shipping

deliverytime.paragraph: Use metafields to show product delivery times. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789851-shipping-and-delivery)
deliverytime.paragraph__2: Do you want to show default deliverytimes for products where no delivery time-metafield is set up? Enter them below.

default_product_deliverytime_info.label: Default extra info for deliverytime
default_product_deliverytime_info.info: This will show an info icon next to your delivery- and shipping messages on product cards and productpage. The text will show in a popup.

show_deliverytime_always.label: Show delivery time for products without inventory tracking
show_deliverytime_always.info: When inventory tracking is disabled for a product, the 'in stock' delivery time will be shown.

shipping_timer.paragraph: If you handle ‘same day shipping’, show a timer how much time visitors have left to order your products to be shipped today.

shipping_timer_show_until.label: Before what time should your customers order?

shipping_timer_show_from.label: Starting from what time should the timer show up on your page?

shipping_timer_show_unavailable.label: Show shipping timer when product is unavailable

shipping_timer.paragraph__2: On which days do you want to show the timer?

settings.paragraph: You can set up your social links in the ['Brand' page](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/managing-brand-assets) in the Shopify settings, but you can also choose to connect them here.

newsletter_popup_testmode.label: Enable test mode
newsletter_popup_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing the popup. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

age_verify_popup_testmode.label: Enable test mode
age_verify_popup_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing the popup. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

age_verify_popup_cookie_text.label: Cookies text (optional)
age_verify_popup_cookie_text.info: The text will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

denied.paragraph: This will display when the customer has declined the age verification.

show_cookiebanner.label: Show cookie banner/popup
show_cookiebanner.info: The cookie banner or popup will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged, and if no age verification popup is enabled. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

cookiebanner_testmode.label: Enable test mode
cookiebanner_testmode.info: This shows the banner/popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

cookiebanner_image.label: Image in the cookie popup
cookiebanner_image.info: Only applicable in the popup version of the cookie banner. (580 x 540px .png or .svg recommended)

content.paragraph: Heading is only applicable in the popup version of the cookie banner.

cookiebanner_text.label: Text
cookiebanner_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

custom_script_for_head.label: Custom script for head tag
custom_script_for_head.info: This setting allows you to insert scripts into the head tag of the theme code.

custom_script_for_body.label: Custom script for body tag
custom_script_for_body.info: This setting allows you to insert scripts into the body tag of the theme code.

preorder.label: Show pre-order button
preorder.info: This shows a pre-order button as buy button. Only applicable when product has 'continue selling when out of stock' setting active.

settings.paragraph: Settings for a pre-order delivery message can be found in the main productpage section and featured product section.

Turn every image banner across the entire store into a shop the look banner simply by adding 
products in the banner settings. A drawer will open with the selected productcards

shop_the_look_items.label: Products per row
shop_the_look_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789841-shop-the-look)

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

image_move.label: Show move animation on hover on banner
image_move.info: Not applicable when 'Space between banners' is less than 10px.

show_content_on_hover.label: Show content on hover on banner images

content_on_hover_color_palette.label: Color scheme on hover on banner images

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

image_move.label: Show move animation on hover on banner
image_move.info: Not applicable when 'Space between banners' is less than 10px.

content_on_hover_color_palette.label: Color scheme on hover on banner images

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

transparent.label: Enable transparent header
transparent.info: Only applicable when used as first section and when full width is selected.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: More information on the layouts can be found [here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8487537-static-section).

options__17.label: Image portrait and landscape video overlapping

images.paragraph: Upload your images and choose a layout above that suits your needs.

video.paragraph: Select a video file and choose a layout that includes video of choice.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

number_of_items.label: Columns per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more collections than columns per row, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789793-section-lookbook)

second_image.label: Second image (optional)
second_image.info: The second image will show on hover.

second_video.label: Second video (optional)
second_video.info: The second video will show on hover.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

settings.paragraph: Customize your content using blocks. The positon will be automatically optimized for mobile.

link_text_2.label: Second button label
link_text_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image.label: Cover image (optional)
image.info: Select an image to play the video in a popup, leave blank to play video on the page.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

settings.paragraph: Customize your content using blocks. The positon will be automatically optimized for mobile.

video_url.label: Video URL
video_url.info: Accepts Vimeo or YouTube links. You can also upload or select a video from your media library by using the 'Video' setting below.

video_alt_text.label: Video URL alt text
video_alt_text.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

link_text_2.label: Second button label
link_text_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_before.label: Before image
image_before.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789796-section-image-comparison)

image_after.label: After image
image_after.info: Make sure the dimension match the before image.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when image ratio is set to 100%.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

collections.label: Collections
collections.info: Create your looks in collections and add them here

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

amount_of_items.label: Show amount of items in the collections

number_of_items.label: Collections per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more collections than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789806-section-collection-list)

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

height.label: Height
height.info: Full height is only applicable in combination with a transparent header.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

image.label: Image
image.info: Slideshow can be used in three different layouts. For more information and recommended image sizes [click here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789788-section-slideshow).

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: Only applicable when ‘Image left, content right' or 'image right, content left’ is selected.

content_width.label: Content width
content_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width.

first_link_text.label: First button label
first_link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

second_link_text.label: Second button label
second_link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

content_width.label: Content width
content_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

bulk.label: Enable variant bulk order
bulk.info: Customers will be able to add product variants. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8825899-xpert-variant-bulk-order)

product.label: Product (optional)
product.info: Select a product or the content can be filled below.

content.paragraph: Only applicable when there is no product selected.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

content_width.label: Content width
content_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

product.label: Product
product.info: Select a product or the content can be filled below.

content.paragraph: Only applicable when there is no product selected.

settings.paragraph: The following inputs are required for the form to submit successfully: Email and either a Message or Text input.

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Only applicable when 'compact view' is enabled

settings.paragraph: You can fill in maximum 6 options. If you want less options, fill in less. Not all 6 are required.
You can fill in maximum 6 options. If you want less options, fill in less. Not all 6 are required.

image.label: Background image
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789809-section-counters)

numbers_boxed.label: Show a background color for the counters

numbers_accent_color.label: Show the counter digits in accent color

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

countdown_start.label: Start date + time
countdown_start.info: When do you want the countdown timer to start? Before this time, the banner will not be shown.

number_of_items.label: Logos per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more logos than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789810-section-brand-logo-slider)

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

number_of_items.label: Logos per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more logos than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789790-section-press-coverage)

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image.label: Background image (optional)
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789811-section-newsletter)

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789812-section-recently-viewed-products)

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when image ratio is set to 100%.

layout.paragraph: If used, show the following information on the product cards.

number_of_items.label: Blog posts per row
number_of_items.info: From 5 blog posts it generates another layout. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789813-section-blog-posts)

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

content_width.label: Content width
content_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width. Image/video width can be selected separately within the block settings.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the image will be full width.

video_width.label: Video width
video_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the video will be full width.

custom_height.label: Custom height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom height’ is enabled.

custom_height_mobile.label: Custom height
custom_height_mobile.info: Only applicable when ‘custom height’ is enabled.

link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

testimonials_boxed.label: Show a background color for the testimonials

author.label: Author
author.info: Leave blank when the author is anonymous.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789818-section-featured-collection)

text_alignment.label: Heading position
text_alignment.info: If ‘Next to the products’ is selected, it shows a max of 3 products per row.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789822-section-featured-products)

text_alignment.label: Heading position
text_alignment.info: If ‘Next to the products’ is selected, it shows a max of 3 products per row.

link_text.label: Button label

space_between_text.label: Space between text
space_between_text.info: Only applicable when ‘text from left’ or ‘text from right’ is enabled.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

font_weight.info: Text font and text font weight are only applicable when animation effect 'typewriter text' is chosen. For other animation effects, these are set in the block settings.

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Only applicable when typewriter is active

custom_text_size.label: Custom text font size
custom_text_size.info: Only applicable when ‘custom text font size’ is enabled.

font_weight.info: Text font and text font weight is only applicable when animation effect 'text from left' of 'text from right' is chosen. For the 'typewriter text' animation, these are set in the section settings.

image.label: Custom image
image.info: Only applicable when ‘text from left’ or ‘text from right’ is enabled.

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when image ratio is set to 100%.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

slider.paragraph: The slider settings below are only applicable when kinetic text is disabled.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: More information on header layouts can be found [here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789865-header-settings).

options__2.label: Logo left, menubar, variant extended search

options__3.label: Logo left, menubar, compact search right

width.label: Width
width.info: When you choose 2000px, the header will be full width.

navbar_menu_item_text.label: Extra menu item in top bar

information.paragraph: Add information using blocks in the sections area.

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.info: To keep the header layout as optimized as possible, the logo has a maximum height of 130px.

searchbar_width.label: Search bar width
searchbar_width.info: Not applicable for a centered search bar or full width search drawer. When you choose 600px, the search bar will be full width.

sticky.label: Sticky header or menu
sticky.info: Sticky menu is only applicable when a layout with menubar is enabled.

show_dropdown_images.label: Show collection images in menus
show_dropdown_images.info: Show the collection image before the title.

show_dropdown_images_subs.label: Show collection images in submenus
show_dropdown_images_subs.info: Only applicable when 'show collection images in menus' is enabled.

show_dropdown_images_autofill.label: Auto-fill collection images
show_dropdown_images_autofill.info: Automatically use the first product images when missing the collection image.

show_dropdown_images_rounded.label: Show collection images in a circle

menu_items_color_palette.label: Menu items color scheme
menu_items_color_palette.info: Only applicable when 'Enable custom styling' is enabled.

custom_menu_items_per_columns.label: Custom menu items per column
custom_menu_items_per_columns.info: By default, the items in the megamenu will be divided into columns based but this can be overruled by setting a custom number of items per column below.

menu_items_limit.label: Menu items per column
menu_items_limit.info: Only applicable when 'custom menu items per column' is enabled. Note that submenu items will not be divided into separate columns.

submenu_items_limit.label: Submenu items per column
submenu_items_limit.info: The last submenu items will be followed by a 'show more' link in the megamenu

darkmode_extra_image.label: Image for dark background
darkmode_extra_image.info: Make sure this image has the same dimensions as the regular image.

transparent_header.paragraph: Only applicable with Static section and Slideshow section.

enable_background_transparent_header_on_.label: Show background of transparent header on hover
enable_background_transparent_header_on_.info: Only applicable when transparent header is enabled.

enable_button.label: Show button
enable_button.info: By default the button will link to the login page and will overrule the account icon, but this behaviour can be overruled by adding a custom link to the button.

button_url.label: Button link (optional)
button_url.info: This will overrule the button link to the login page.

logo_width_mobile.label: Mobile logo width
logo_width_mobile.info: To keep the header layout as optimized as possible, the logo has a maximum height of 88px.

search_mobile_bd.label: Show searchbar border
search_mobile_bd.info: Only applicable when compact search icon is disabled.

liquid.label: Custom Liquid
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

usp.label: Heading
usp.info: When the line of text is longer than a mobile screen width can handle, it will show a ‘more info’ link that opens a popup.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Copy and paste the name of an item created in your menu to create a dropdown menu. [Read more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789865-header-settings#h_4fb96ad5c6)

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

layout.label: Banner layout
layout.info: Only applicable when both banners are enabled.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Copy and paste the name of an item created in your menu to create a dropdown menu. [Read more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789865-header-settings#h_4fb96ad5c6)

bottom_img.label: Image
bottom_img.info: A logo or a trustmark is commonly used for the footer bottombar.

enable_country_selector.label: Show country selector
enable_country_selector.info: Make sure 'show country selector' is enabled in the header settings.

enable_language_selector.label: Show language selector
enable_language_selector.info: Make sure 'show language selector' is enabled in the header settings.

enable_follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop
enable_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

liquid.label: Custom Liquid
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

split_menu.label: Split menu
split_menu.info: This will show a large menu in two parts, the other blocks will always be shown first.

liquid.label: Custom Liquid
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

customer_support_img.label: Image
customer_support_img.info: For best results use an image with a max. width of 320px.

extra_customer_support.label: Text
extra_customer_support.info: Do you want to show any other info about your company? You can show the opening hours, for example.

socials_color_palette.label: Icons in circle color scheme
socials_color_palette.info: Only applicable when 'show in circle' is enabled.

enable_follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop
enable_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

enable_share_button.label: Enable share button
enable_share_button.info: Only applicable on the product page

settings.paragraph: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products#recommendation-logic)
Make sure you install [Shopify's free Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app before enabling this section.

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Create a menu containing all of your info pages. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789830-default-pages)

show_login_links.label: Show sign in and register links for customers

show_maps_url.label: Show a link to Google Maps after the address

google_maps_iframe.label: Google Maps embed code
google_maps_iframe.info: Show your shops' location in Google Maps. You can find the embed code by searching your store in Google Maps, clicking 'Share' and then choosing 'Embed a map'. [Learn more](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/144361)

enable.label: Enable sticky add to cart bar

hide_in_theme_editor.label: Hide sticky add to cart bar in the theme editor

custom_product_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_product_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

thumbs.info: Only applicable when Images Layout 'Image slider' is selected.

description_title_size_for_content.label: Apply 'heading size' to product description headings
description_title_size_for_content.info: The headings in the product description will be the same size as the heading in the product description block.

pros_and_cons.paragraph: Pros and cons can be setup with metafields. More information on metafields and this feature can be found [here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789888-how-to-set-up-product-page-metafields).

specifications.paragraph: Product specifications can be setup with metafields. More information on metafields and this feature can be found [here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789888-how-to-set-up-product-page-metafields).

multiply_bg_mobile.label: Enable light background
multiply_bg_mobile.info: Only applicable when ‘Pass through colors on product images’ is enabled. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789856-images)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

custom_html.label: Custom HTML
custom_html.info: Add app snippets, embed code or other HTML code to create advanced customizations.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Title is only applicable as a block when used ‘right’.

title.label: Custom title
title.info: Leave empty to show the product title.

vendor.paragraph: It will show like this when both selected: Vendor Vendor name

show_product_rating.label: Show product ratings
show_product_rating.info: The ratings will be automatically shown from your review app!

layout_mobile.label: Layout
layout_mobile.info: This changes the position of the product title based on the main product image.

show_read_more.label: Show a 'read more' link which scrolls to the product description

settings.paragraph: Check out the general theme settings to set up a custom short description. You can find the settings under the tab named 'Products'.
You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Products'.
You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Shipping and delivery'.

button_options.label: Always show buttons for option(s)
button_options.info: The option name(s) that should always use variant picker type 'buttons', for example 'Color'. You can use multiple names by entering them on separate lines.

dropdown_options.label: Always show a dropdown for option(s)
dropdown_options.info: The option name(s) that should always use variant picker type 'dropdown', for example 'Size'. You can use multiple names by entering them on separate lines.

show_selected_variant_images.label: Show images from selected variants only
show_selected_variant_images.info: Only applicable when color swatches are active. Setup your color swatches in general settings: [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789828-product-page#h_2d76ccaa41)

show_unavailable_variants.label: Show unavailable variants
show_unavailable_variants.info: Unavailable variants can only be hidden when separate option pickers are not applicable for the product.

show_single_options.label: Show options with only one variant
show_single_options.info: Only applicable when separate option pickers are enabled.

enable_selling_plans.label: Enable subscriptions
enable_selling_plans.info: For more information on how to set up subscriptions [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/purchase-options/subscriptions).

size_name.label: Size name
size_name.info: The option name used for the size, for example 'Size' or 'Sizing'. You can add multiple names by entering each on a separate line.

settings.paragraph: Customers will be able to add product variants in bulk. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8825899-xpert-variant-bulk-order)

show_variant_images.label: Show variant images
show_variant_images.info: Only applicable when layout 'One row' is enabled.

shorten_title.label: Shorten variant title
shorten_title.info: If the title is too long, it will be automatically shortened with '…'

usp.label: Information
usp.info: Wrap your text between | to use accent color. For example: Heading |continued| text.

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Trustbadge'.
You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Shipping and delivery'.

text.label: Information
text.info: This information appears when the visitor clicks on the ‘I’ icon next to the heading.

true_size_value.label: Selected option
true_size_value.info: Provide one of the options above to let customers know if this product is true to size. A metafield can be linked to this field. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789828-product-page)

title_text.label: Information
title_text.info: This information appears when the visitor clicks on the ‘I’ icon next to the heading.

benefit_text.label: Information
benefit_text.info: This information appears when the visitor clicks on the ‘I’ icon next to the benefit.

benefit_value.label: Selected score
benefit_value.info: Determine the score of the benefit from 1 to 5. A metafield can be linked to this field. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789828-product-page)

collapse.label: Collapse by default
collapse.info: Only applicable for 'Accordion' and the mobile view of 'Tab'.

title_size.label: Heading size
title_size.info: Only applicable when 'regular' layout is chosen.

content.paragraph: All content can be filled static or with metafields. All content can be used seperate or together in this block. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789828-product-page)

show_contact_form.label: Show contact form
show_contact_form.info: A standard contact form will appear below the content.

settings.paragraph: This block only works with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. If no additional products are set, placeholder products will be shown (only in the theme editor). To select complementary products add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

collapse.label: Collapse by default
collapse.info: Only applicable for 'Accordion' and the mobile view of 'Tab'.

title_size.label: Heading size
title_size.info: Only applicable when 'regular' layout is chosen.

products_layout.paragraph: If used, show the following information on the product cards.

show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button
show_dynamic_buybutton.info: Customers will see their preferred payment method, like PayPal or Apple Pay. Only applicable when 'variant picker' is enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/dynamic-checkout)

button_style_dynamic_buybutton.label: Dynamic buy button styling
button_style_dynamic_buybutton.info: Not applicable for all dynamic buy buttons.

preorder_label.label: Delivery label
preorder_label.info: Add a delivery message to the pre-order button with metafields or general text content. If you want to show this information in your order mails, click [here](https://community.shopify.com/c/shopify-design/product-pages-get-customization-information-for-products/td-p/616503) for documentation.

preorder_show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button for pre-orders

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

settings.paragraph: It will show like this when both selected: Vendor Vendor name

enable_grid_list_toggle.info: Only applicable when 'Variant bulk order' is enabled.

enable_variants.label: Enable variant bulk order
enable_variants.info: Customers will be able to add product variants in bulk. This will overrule the default gridview when no grid/list toggle is enabled. [More info](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8825899-xpert-variant-bulk-order)

bulk_shorten_title.label: Shorten variant title
bulk_shorten_title.info: If the title is too long, it will be automatically shortened with '…'

show_collection_image.info: Only applicable when 'menu' or 'filters' are enabled.

filters_menu_alignment.label: Alignment
filters_menu_alignment.info: Only applicable when Filter layout: static is enabled.

filter_menu.label: Menu
filter_menu.info: A menu which will be used to display related collections. Click [here](https://intercom.help/xtra-for-shopify/en/articles/8789829-collections) for more info on how to build this menu.

collections_menu.label: Collections
collections_menu.info: Select related collections and/or choose a menu above. Duplicate items will be hidden automatically.
